mapper.insert: insert into trade (trade_from, trade_to,trade_amount,trade_state, trade_info) value( #{trade_from} ,#{trade_to}, #{amount} ,#{trade_state}, #{trade_info} )
mapper.select: select * ,date_format(trade_date,'%Y.%m.%d %T') as fmtdate from trade t, seed s where trade_to = seed_number and ((trade_to=#{seed_number} and trade_state=1) or (trade_from=#{seed_number} and trade_state=1))
